resources.string: This is a timer for doing Sprint 8 exercise workouts, alleged to build muscle and burn fat efficiently. Talk to your doctor before beginning any exercise program. This app was written by Will Ware and is under the Apache license. The web link below points to more info on my blog.

How to do a Sprint 8 workout: Do a few minutes of light warm-up exercise. Press the "Sprint" button to begin a sprint. Exercise hard for 30 seconds, avoiding injury. Then move to an easier pace for 90 to 120 seconds and catch your breath. Repeat the hard/easy cycle eight times. To change sprint duration, go into Menu->Settings.
The author of this app has made every effort to follow best practices, but the user assumes any risk of the app trashing the phone.

The user assumes responsibility for his or her health. The app is provided for entertainment purposes only. The user understands that any exercise program should be undertaken only under the supervision of a doctor.
